name: Life Simulator: Survive the Madness
description:
[Life Simulator Series]Life simulation, with multiple choices

Choose your character's destiny, make a path for yourself, survive the madness with choices!

The first game of the life simulator series.

Please report bugs and glitches or give ideas to me at ccheukka@gmail.com!

How to play:

This game is one of the editions of Life Simulator. This edition puts your character into disastrous situations. Enter the corresponding number for your choice in each situation, then read the storyline for that choice. Just remember, you can't reverse your choices so please consider and choose carefully. Also, you can't save this game so cheat is prohibited. Every choice you make affects what situation your character faces and plot of the whole story. Keywords are highlighted for you. Survive until the end of the story and allow your epic story to be told to the world!
